name: Steve Adventure Remastered
description:
Version 1.0.0

You play as minceraft steve in minecaft land and big noob herobrine attack village! Defeat big noob herobrine and save village!!!!!!!!!!!

DISCLAIMER

This game is a joke and should not be taken very seriously, and is a recreation of the original Steve Adventure.

All of Minecraft belongs to Mojang Studios, I have to credits for any assets taken from it.

Use the arrow keys to move, as well as Z to jump, X to attack and A to run.

This game was made on Scratch 3.25.0
